Description: Add or edit data only in the Property columns; keep the first five columns untouched.
Maintain the same year order across income and expense rows (use YYYY=value pairs).
Unique stable identifier used in URLs and lookups (do not change after creating).
Full property name shown in the app.
Short label for cards and chips (optional if same as Display Name).
Street number only; combined with Street Name for address.
Unit or suite identifier (leave blank for whole property).
Used for filtering and analytics (e.g., Condo, Townhouse).
Relative path or full URL to display photo.
Total closing costs paid at acquisition.
Most recent appraised or estimated value.
Date for the current market value estimate.
Calculated as Down Payment + Closing Costs + Initial Renovations + Capital Improvements (leave blank to auto-calc).
Name of current tenant (leave blank if vacant).
Unit identifier for the current tenant.
Lease start date for the current tenant.
Enter actual end date or Active for ongoing lease.
Monthly rent received from the current tenant.
Auto-calculated from Current Monthly Rent if left blank.
Start date of the prior lease.
End date of the prior lease.
Monthly rent paid by the prior tenant.
Start date of the earlier lease.
End date of the earlier lease.
Monthly rent paid by the earlier tenant.
Monthly property tax used in cash flow calculations.
Average monthly maintenance reserve or spend.
Monthly utilities paid by the owner (optional).
Auto-calculated from mortgage details if blank.
Optional override for monthly interest (leave blank to auto-calc).
Optional override for monthly principal (leave blank to auto-calc).
Set the chronological sequence for annual metrics (use | between years).
Annual rent totals matching the Year Sequence.
Annual mortgage interest or bank fees by year.
Annual property tax totals by year.
Travel costs attributable to the property.
Vehicle expenses allocated to the property.
Name of the lender for the primary mortgage.
Yes if payments remain constant over the term.
Original amount of the second mortgage.
Term length for the second mortgage.
Freeform notes about the property (appears on detail and data pages).
